subject: Cactus and Weblogic
msgSnippet: Hello, I am trying to get cactus running with weblogic. Unfortunately we are running weblogic 4.5.2 which appears to use version 2.1 of the servlet API. Cactus
messageBody:
Hello,

I am trying to get cactus running with weblogic.
Unfortunately we are running weblogic 4.5.2 which
appears to use version 2.1 of the servlet API. Cactus
appears to use either version 2.2 or 2.3 of the
servlet API. Does anyone know how to get Cactus
running under weblogic 4.5.2? It appears that we have
to upgrade our version of weblogic in order to make
use of helpful API's such as cactus.

Regards

David
